data.title: ICICI Bank, Axis Bank, and HDFC Bank: Technical details highlighted for readers
data.description: Vishal Wagh, Research Head at Bonanza Portfolio says that banking and financial sector is facing major supply pressure issues thanks to the surging cases of Covid-19 and the steps like corona curfew and implementation of section 144 in a state like Maharashtra will add more fear to it. The second wave of Covid-19 has put selling pressure on the Indian market

data.author: zee business
data.title: SBI, ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank remain systemically important banks: RBI
data.description: The RBI on Tuesday said state-owned SBI, along with private sector lenders ICICI Bank and HDFC Bank continue to be Domestic Systemically Important Banks (D-SIBs) or institutions which are 'too big to fail'.

data.title: Access Bank acquires Zambia’s Cavmont Bank
data.description: Access Bank Plc has strengthened its operations in Zambia with the completion of acquisition of Cavmont Bank Limited. data.author: stevek173
data.title: Bank Bonuses
data.description:
Anyone chase them? Never huge but an extra hundo or two here and there doesn't hurt.  
 
You have to pick your spots, who charges what fees and how long is the requirement before you get the bonus, what is required, etc.  
 
Ran into a decent one with Fulton Bank. $200 for a checking account with...

data.title: Bank of Baroda launches WhatsApp banking services for all
data.description: The services offered by the bank via WhatsApp will be balance inquiry, mini statement, cheque status enquiry, cheque book request, blocking of a debit card, information on the bank’s products and services, etc.

data.title: KBWB, KBWR Have Investors Banking on the Banking Sector
data.description: Historically speaking, rising rates are a boon for bank stocks and the related exchange traded funds. Up nearly 5% over the past week, the Invesco KBW Bank ETF (NASDAQ: KBWB) is proving the point. KBWB tracks the widely followed KBW Nasdaq Bank Index. “The Index is a modified-market capitalization-weighted index of companies primarily engaged in US [...]The post KBWB, KBWR Have Investors Banking on the Banking Sector appeared first on ETF Trends.

data.title: Savings Bank’s South Ukiah Banking Center reopens
data.description: Savings Bank of Mendocino County recently announced that its South Ukiah Banking Center, 1100 Airport Park Blvd., has reopened. Lobby hours are 9 a.m. to 3 p.m.
